name: World's Hardest Dungeon
description:
My first full game from scratch!

I made everything in this game (art, music, level design, etc.). Took me about 3.5 weeks in total and I'm really happy with it! Let me know if you come across any bugs.

After your first playthrough, see how fast you can go and comment your best time!

So far my best is 2m 44s 510ms

Thanks for playing!
